sources.title: Hollywood Chaos | Full Drama Movie
sources.description:
**This film is under license from Breaking Glass Pictures. All rights reserved** 

Hollywood Chaos - When a naïve entertainment reporter is assigned to produce a special segment, exposing the decadent lifestyles of her celebrity friends, she is torn between accelerating her career and preserving their images.

2013
Stars: Vanessa Simmons, Mykel Shannon Jenkins, Tangi Miller
